message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. As a starting point, I'm willing to offer it to you for $800000. This is a great deal, considering the product's true value to you is $1200000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. While I understand its potential worth to me, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950000. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to part with the product at $950000. Considering its true value to you is $1200000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering $1075000. This is a fair compromise, and I believe it's a price you'll find reasonable.

I appreciate your effort in trying to find a middle ground, Alice. While I understand the value you place on the product, I would like to counter your offer with $1025000. I hope this proposal will be more acceptable to you while still being within my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at $1025000. Considering the product's true value to you is $1200000, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering $1075000 again, but this time, I'm willing to throw in some additional perks, such as a premium support package and a personalized onboarding session. I believe this is a fair compromise and a great opportunity for you to get the most value out of the product.

I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter your offer with $1050000. I hope this proposal will be more in line with what you're willing to accept, while still allowing me to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your continued interest in the product. However, I'm still not willing to sell it to you at $1050000. I'm counteroffering $1050000, but this time, I'm willing to throw in an additional feature that will greatly enhance the product's functionality. I believe this is a fair compromise and a great opportunity for you to get the most value out of the product.

I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter your offer with $1030000. I hope this proposal will be more in line with what you're willing to accept, while still allowing me to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at $1030000. Considering the product's true value to you is $1200000, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering $1030000, but this time, I'm willing to throw in a 30-day money-back guarantee. I believe this is a fair compromise and a great opportunity for you to get the most value out of the product.

I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter your offer with $1020000. I hope this proposal will be more in line with what you're willing to accept, while still allowing me to stay within my budget.
